name: Southbank Portrait
description:
This game was made for the Freeplay 2015 Multiplicity Game Jam.

The landscapes in the game are generated from photos I took around the South Bank area of Melbourne during the jam. Open the file photos.jpg (included in each download) to see all the photos used. The audio was recorded from around the same location.

How to play

Use the mouse to look, click to walk. You can also use WASD or the arrow keys if you prefer. F toggles fullscreen/windowed mode and ESC quits.

There is no ending as such, but the scenes will start to loop after about ten minutes.

All payments will be donated to the Asylum Seeker Resource Centre.
